product_name: GOOD TO-GO Smoked Three Bean Chili - 2 Servings
long_description: With wholesome ingredients you can actually pronounce, this Smoked Three Bean Chili with corn and caramelized onions is an easy and delicious entree that will warm you from the inside out.
short_description: With wholesome ingredients you can actually pronounce, this Smoked Three Bean Chili with corn and caramelized onions is an easy and delicious entree that will warm you from the inside out.
